title: Cowboys, Packers, Pistons, Bill Belichick
itunes:title: Cowboys, Packers, Pistons, Bill Belichick
description:
Colin talks about if the Cowboys draft will have an impact, why the Packers are further away from winning a championship, the portrayal of the Pistons in the Bulls documentary, and Bill Belichick's plan for the Patriots going forward. Guests include John Lynch, Ryen Russillo, Ben Watson, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
